Our Services

Ukraine is a brilliant place to explore: great delicious food, fantastic quality for spa/beauty industry, cool, unique restaurants, thousands of cafes, and the best price in the end! Ukraine is not a top travel destination yet, and on the one hand, this is a great time for YOU to come there and get incredible emotions and experiences for little money.

Individually picked tour

Save time with our short questionary to select the best options for you! Where to stay (hotel, Airbnb), how to fly (we also book fly tickets), what places are must-visit. We respect your time!

24/7 Support

We speak English, Deutsch, по-Русски and Українською
We are not only booking for you all entertainments, but we also support you when you are on a voyage: in case you need to change your plans or want something special! One message, and we will make it for you.

First-class service - affordable price

Our services price is only a 10% price of your whole tour.
*We don't calculate booking restaurants or cafes.

We offer

We will individually find and book your tour, places to visit, a guide to visit historical or special places, medical/beauty services, restaurants to eat, according to your tastes and expectations! You will just need to come to the airport and enjoy it!

About

Below we describe steps towards your perfect trip

  • 1 step:

    You reach us using our contact form.

    Please use this google form to contact us, describe your request, select options, or to arrange a call.

  • 2 step:

    We provide you options, places, and prices

    We have researched and selected options, we are happy to share them with you, to get your opinion and feedback. We make a final list with appointments/places to book and approve it with you.

  • 3 step:

    We arrange all appointments

    We make calls and book all appointments; we make sure that the time is convenient for you, that there are no gaps between your arrangements; nonetheless, we keep a healthy balance, so your day is not heavy and not overloaded.

  • 4 step:

    You pay only 10% for our services

    We send you an official price list from the places you are going to visit, date/times, addresses of your booked appointment. You will pay for your appointments on the spot: e.g., in the medical center or in the hotel.
    You get 24/7 support in case of any questions or unforeseen situations or changes of plans.
    You will pay 10% of the total amount for our services.
    You will receive from us official documents and checks; everything is legal!

Food Heaven

Ukrainian cuisine is delicious, satisfying, varied!
A warm climate and fertile land played a significant role here.
Must try:

Salo

is the central national food in Ukraine.

Borsch

is beetroot soup with meat broth (possibly, vegetarian).

Dumplings, or pirogi

- one of the most famous national dishes of Ukraine. With cottage cheese, fruits, potatoes and mushrooms, cabbage.

Kyiv cutlet

is chicken fillet roll with a piece of butter inside, breadcrumbs, and deep-fried.

"Kyiv cake"

is two layers of walnut meringue, bonded with buttercream.

Example of restaurants or cafe with prices

Korchma Taras Bulba, Kyiv, Ukrainian cuisine

1. Borsch, 300 grams 3,21 USD
2. Sweet dumplings, 220 grams 3,44 USD

Mama Manana, Kyiv, Georgian cuisine

1. Adjara khachapuri, 450 grams 5,34 USD
2. Hinkali with turkey (3 pieces), 2,43 USD

Milk Bar, Kyiv, breakfast, cakes

1. Super Breakfast 1, 11,39 US
and much more...

Beauty Salons

Beauty procedures in Ukraine is a separate type of pleasure!
Beautiful salons that work on weekends and until late at night, sterility of instruments, the professionalism of masters, for whom each client is a VIP client at great prices!

Here are some popular beauty procedures and prices

GBar, Kyiv

1. Male/Female Manicure, 10,08 USD
2. Acid Pedicure, 17 USD
3. Gel polish, 11,95 USD
4. Evening Make Up, 24,27 USD

IDN beauty, Kyiv

1. DMK Face cleaning (micro peel + acu masque), 90 mins, 24,65 USD
2. Contour plastic(lip augmentation/correction, nasolabial wrinkle correction, cheekbone enlargement) Juvederm Smile 0.55 ml, 90 mins, 186,72 USD

Lumenis, Laser hair removal, Kyiv

1. Bikini completely, 20 mins, from 27,63 USD
2. Legs completely, 60 mins, from 57,51 USD
and much more...

Medical

For your comfort and confidence, we will schedule your appointments to the best, highly qualified doctors in well-equipped clinics. You can take blood tests, 3D ultrasound, do teeth whitening or ceramic fillings, improve your health in mud resorts, and much more at excellent prices!

Here are some popular medical procedures and prices

Parodent, Lviv

1. Teeth whitening using a lamp and the Beyond system (one jaw) (smile area), 78,42 USD
2. Art restoration of 1 tooth, 36 USD
3. Professional oral hygiene removal of dental deposits - the Air-floor and Air-floow Perio techniques from 18 USD

The European laboratory chain Synevo, everywhere

1. Full health examination + report describing laboratory indicators, 82,16 USD
2. Hepatitis B virus (HBV), 8 USD
3. Package No. 318 (Vegetarian Health), 97 USD
4. Ultrasound of the thyroid gland and regional lymph nodes, 17,25 USD

Mineral Water Treatment in the Carpathians

There are many hotels with Mineral Water Treatment.
Typically, Package of procedures "All-inclusive" will cost from 14 USD / day
It will include such procedures only after consultation with a hotel doctor:
mineral water treatment in the resort of Morshyn, diet therapy, hardware physiotherapy (high- and low-frequency electrotherapy, electro-mud therapy, ultrasound, microstimulation), therapeutic baths (bischofite, with concentrates of medicinal herbs, with soybean lipids, hydromassage, underwater shower-massage), ozokerite and paraffin therapy, therapeutic inhalations, tubage, therapeutic microclusters, massage.
and much more...

Bachelorette Party

A photo session with friends, a cozy evening in a chic restaurant, dancing until the morning, luxurious limousine, or maybe a quiet, cozy evening on the roof or in the cinema? We will organize an exceptional evening for you!

Bachelor Party

Bachelor party in a limousine, party bus, night club, in nature, calm or active but definitely memorable! Tell us your tastes and get ready for an explosion of emotions.
